title: 10/10/2015 UN officials condemn terrorist bombings in Turkey (United Nations General Assembly)
text: ( Source : United Nations General Assembly ) 10 October 2015 - United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon has denounced today's terrorist bombings in Ankara, Turkey . 'The Secretary-General condemns today's terrorist bombings in Ankara ,
